All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Board
This is an interface for a Tic-Tac-Toe board.
ComputerPlayer
This class represents a computer player player in a Tic-Tac-Toe game and extends the UserPlayer class.
CSSStyles
This class defines various CSS styles that are used to set the appearance of user interface (UI) elements in the GUI.
GameState
This enum represents the possible states of a Tic-Tac-Toe game: a win for one of the players, a tie, a game in progress, and an invalid move.
GUI
This class contains all the necessary methods to create a graphical user interface for a Tic-Tac-Toe game.
Player
This is an interface for a player in a Tic-Tac-Toe game.
TicTacToeBoard
This class represents a Tic-Tac-Toe board and implements the Board interface.
UIBoardActions
This class contains utility methods for handling user interaction with the UI Tic-Tac-Toe board, which is clicking the tiles.
UIConstants
This class contains all the constants used for setting up the user interface (UI) of the Tic-Tac-Toe game.
UIElements
This class contains methods that create and return different elements of the user interface for all scenes in all game states such as labels, buttons and combo-boxes for the Tic-Tac-Toe GUI.
UserPlayer
This class represents a human player in a Tic-Tac-Toe game and implements the Player interface.
